languages.text: "После такого провала в обороне, Клеменциа, и вам, и остальным бездарям, якобы заботящимся о моем мире-столице, нужно готовиться к основательным чисткам".
"After such a debacle in our defences, Clementia, you and the other mediocrities who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."
languages.original_text: "После такого провала в обороне, Клеменциа, и вам, и остальным бездарям, якобы заботящимся о моем мире-столице, нужно готовиться к основательным чисткам".

traits.locale_text: "After such a debacle in our defenses, Clementia, you and the other washouts who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."
"After such a debacle in our defenses, Clementia, you and the other washouts who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."
"After such a debacle in our defences, Clementia, you and the other mediocrities who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."
"After such a debacle in our defences, Clementia, you and the other mediocrities who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."
"After such a debacle in our defences, Clementia, you and the other mediocrities who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."

languages.text: 「クレメンティア、あれだけの大失態を犯したのだ。首都惑星の安全を担うお前や他の凡人どもは、近いうちに徹底的に粛清されることになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "After such a debacle in our defences, Clementia, you and the other mediocrities who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."

traits.locale_text: 「クレメンティア、あれだけの大失態を犯したのだ。首都惑星の安全を担うお前や他の凡人どもは、近いうちに徹底的に粛清されることになるだろう」

languages.text: “克莱门缇雅，你和你那群没用的官僚本该保护好我的首都世界，现在却让我们的防御系统遭到了重创。用不了多久，我就要对你们来一次彻底的清洗。”
languages.original_text: "After such a debacle in our defences, Clementia, you and the other mediocrities who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."

traits.locale_text: “克莱门缇雅，你和你那群没用的官僚本该保护好我的首都世界，现在却让我们的防御系统遭到了重创。用不了多久，我就要对你们来一次彻底的清洗。”

languages.text: «Tras semejante desastre en nuestras defensas, Clementia, usted y las otras mediocridades que presuntamente velan por mi mundo capital pueden esperar una purga en el futuro próximo».
languages.original_text: "After such a debacle in our defences, Clementia, you and the other mediocrities who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."

traits.locale_text: «Tras semejante desastre en nuestras defensas, Clementia, usted y las otras mediocridades que presuntamente velan por mi mundo capital pueden esperar una purga en el futuro próximo».

languages.text: « Après ce fiasco, je peux vous assurer que vous allez très prochainement faire l'objet d'une purge conséquente, vous et tous les autres incapables qui étaient censés veiller sur mon monde-capitale. »
languages.original_text: "After such a debacle in our defences, Clementia, you and the other mediocrities who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."

traits.locale_text: « Après ce fiasco, je peux vous assurer que vous allez très prochainement faire l'objet d'une purge conséquente, vous et tous les autres incapables qui étaient censés veiller sur mon monde-capitale. »

languages.text: "Nach diesem Debakel bei unserer Verteidigung, Clementia, könnt Ihr und die übrigen Stümper, die sich angeblich um meine Hauptwelt kümmern, in nächster Zukunft mit einer gründlichen Säuberung rechnen."
languages.original_text: "After such a debacle in our defences, Clementia, you and the other mediocrities who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."

traits.locale_text: "Nach diesem Debakel bei unserer Verteidigung, Clementia, könnt Ihr und die übrigen Stümper, die sich angeblich um meine Hauptwelt kümmern, in nächster Zukunft mit einer gründlichen Säuberung rechnen."

languages.text: "Clementia, savunma hatlarımızdaki bu rezilliğin ardından sen ve senin gibi pespayeleri tasfiye edeceğim. Güya başdünyamı koruyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "After such a debacle in our defences, Clementia, you and the other mediocrities who supposedly look after my capital world can expect a thorough purge in the near future."

traits.locale_text: "Clementia, savunma hatlarımızdaki bu rezilliğin ardından sen ve senin gibi pespayelere çok geçmeden bir tasfiye emri vereceğim. Güya başdünyamı koruyorsunuz."
